apps

Class ServerApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • apps.Application
      • apps.ServerApplication
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NamingServerApp, StorageServerApp

    abstract class ServerApplication
extends Application
    Base class of server applications.

    Server applications are wrappers around the server classes (naming and storage) that allow the servers to be run from the console. This class provides functionality that is common to both server applications: namely, graceful termination.

    In each application, the server runs until the end of file is read from standard input, or until the server stops on its own due to an exception. Server applications also forcefully terminate the JVM if the end of file has been read on standard input, but the server object takes too long to stop.

    Derived application classes override the serverType, startServer, and stopServer methods to deal with the particular kind of server used in the application. The stop method of each server should be overridden to call startTerminationTimer, before calling the superclass implementation. The stopped method should be overridden to call serverStopped.

    Derived classes should create a new object of their own type immediately upon entry into main, and call that object's run method.

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  ServerApplication.BadUsageException
      Indicates that the command line arguments supplied to the application are malformed.
      private class  ServerApplication.EOFThread
      Thread that monitors standard input for end-of-file.
      private class  ServerApplication.TerminationTimeoutTask
      Timer task to terminate the virtual machine if the server does not terminate gracefully.

      private Throwable stop_cause
      If the server stopped due to an exception, gives the exception.

      Indicates that the server has stopped.
      private static long TERMINATION_TIMEOUT
      Time the server is allotted to stop gracefully, in milliseconds.
      private Timer termination_timeout_timer
      Timer used to terminate the JVM forcefully if the server refuses to exit gracefully when commanded.

    • Method Detail

      • serverType

        protected abstract String serverType()
        Returns a string indicating the kind of server being run in the application - either "naming" or "storage".

      • startServer

        protected abstract void startServer(String[] arguments)
                             throws Throwable
        Starts the server.
        Parameters:
        arguments - Command line arguments passed to the application.
        Throws:
        ServerApplication.BadUsageException - If the command line arguments passed to the application are malformed. The message string of the exception object is printed to the console before the application is terminated.
        Throwable - This method is allowed to throw any exception. The exception will be reported on the console, and the application terminated.

      • stopServer

        protected abstract void stopServer()
        Stops the server.

      • run

        protected void run(String[] arguments)
        Runs the application.

        This is the non-static replacement for the main method. It starts the server, starts a thread to wait for end-of-file for standard input, and waits until the server has terminated. Once the server terminates, this method prints a message indicating what kind of termination has occurred.

        Specified by:
        run in class Application
        Parameters:
        arguments - The command line arguments passed to main.

      • startTerminationTimer

        protected void startTerminationTimer()
        Schedules a task that will hard-terminate the JVM if the server fails to stop gracefully.

      • serverStopped

        protected void serverStopped(Throwable cause)
        Indicates that the server has stopped and wakes the waiting main thread.
        Parameters:
        cause - Exception that caused the server to stop, or null if the server stopped normally.
